statement.p: In 29.17 of the last 24 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{24}}={0.2917}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{24}. \displaystyle{P}={0.2917}\cdot{24}={7.0008}. We round that as requested to 7 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
